Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/73rd
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are rerouted in both directions: due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions: 

Northbound via Jeffery, 73rd, Yates, 71st, Jeffery, and resume normal route.
Southbound via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery and resume normal route due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/23rd
ShortDescription: Northbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via  Damen, Blue Island, Western, Cermak and Damen: due to, street blockage near Damen/23rd..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via  Damen, Blue Island, Western, Cermak and Damen: due to, street blockage near Damen/23rd..

Headline: No trains between 95th and Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th and Roosevelt due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th and Roosevelt due to fire department activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and Roosevelt at this time.

Shuttle buses are available from Roosevelt to 95th  provide connecting service through the affected area. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#29 State

#24 Wentworth

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
